mod.name: vexMod
mod.credits: Slay the Spire Discord: Ideas, assistance, other help. Spleeninator, Lyman: Art!

cards.name: Clever Clash
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to attack, gain 8 Block.
Otherwise, deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Clever Clash+
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to attack, gain 11 Block.
Otherwise, deal 11 damage.

cards.name: Training Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Increase the damage of a random Attack in your hand or this card by 3 this combat.

cards.name: Training Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Increase the damage of a random Attack in your hand or this card by 4 this combat.

cards.name: Blood Guard
cards.description:
Lose 4 HP.
Gain 15 Block.

cards.name: Blood Guard+
cards.description:
Lose 3 HP.
Gain 17 Block.

cards.name: Blood to Gold
cards.description:
Lose 3 HP.
Gain 10 Gold.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Blood to Gold+
cards.description:
Lose 3 HP.
Gain 15 Gold.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Crumbling Crash
cards.description:
Remove all Block from the enemy.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Crumbling Crash+
cards.description:
Remove all Block from the enemy.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Cursed Strike
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
Add a random Curse into your hand.

cards.name: Cursed Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
Add a random Curse into your hand.

cards.name: Ground Pound
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Ground Pound+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Hatred
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add a random Attack to your hand.

cards.name: Hatred+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of your turn, add a random Attack to your hand.

cards.name: Battle Stance
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Gain 3 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Battle Stance+
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Gain 4 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Curse Blast
cards.description: Deal 25 damage. If this does not kill an enemy, add a random Curse into your deck.

cards.name: Curse Blast+
cards.description: Deal 35 damage. If this does not kill an enemy, add a random Curse into your deck.

cards.name: Devastation
cards.description:
Lose 6 HP.
Deal damage equal to your missing HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Devastation+
cards.description:
Lose 3 HP.
Deal damage equal to your missing HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Elimination
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Exhaust any number of cards in your hand.

cards.name: Elimination+
cards.description:
Deal 17 damage.
Exhaust any number of cards in your hand.

cards.name: Insult
cards.description:
Apply X Weak.
Apply X Vulnerable.
Gain X Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Insult+
cards.description:
Apply X+1 Weak.
Apply X+1 Vulnerable.
Gain X+1 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Strike Storm
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Whenever you play a non-Attack card, play a πStrike.

cards.name: Strike Storm+
cards.description: Whenever you play a non-Attack card, play a πStrike.

cards.name: Pinpoint Kick
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
If this breaks the enemy's Block, apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Pinpoint Kick+
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
If this breaks the enemy's Block, apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Shadow Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Next turn, gain 6 Block.

cards.name: Shadow Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Next turn, gain 6 Block.

cards.name: Venom Sigh
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block.
Apply 3 Poison.

cards.name: Venom Sigh+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
Apply 4 Poison.

cards.name: Bandage Whip
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Enemy loses 2 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Bandage Whip+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Enemy loses 3 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Prepare Victim
cards.description:
Apply Slow.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Prepare Victim+
cards.description:
Apply Slow.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Scaled Poison
cards.description:
Apply 2 Poison.
Double this card's Poison this combat.

cards.name: Scaled Poison+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Poison.
Double this card's Poison this combat.

cards.name: Shield Swipe
cards.description:
Steal the enemy's Block.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Shield Swipe+
cards.description:
Steal the enemy's Block.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Deadly Dodge
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to attack, gain 1 Intangible and Exhaust.
Otherwise, apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Poison.

cards.name: Deadly Dodge+
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to attack, gain 1 Intangible and Exhaust.
Otherwise, apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Poison.

cards.name: Evasive Thoughts
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add a random Skill to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Evasive Thoughts+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add a random Skill to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Ghostly Blitz
cards.description:
Play a copy of all Attacks in your Exhaust pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ghostly Blitz+
cards.description:
Play a copy of all Attacks in your Exhaust pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Jackpot!
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Apply 7 Poison.
Gain !vexMod:SecondMagic! Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Jackpot!+
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 7 damage.
Apply 7 Poison.
Gain !vexMod:SecondMagic! Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Midnight Strike
cards.description:
Can only be played if you have played exactly 11 cards this combat.
Deal 100 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Midnight Strike+
cards.description:
Can only be played if you have played exactly 11 cards this combat.
Deal 100 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Nifty Moves
cards.description: Play the top X cards of your draw pile.

cards.name: Nifty Moves+
cards.description: Play the top X+1 cards of your draw pile.

cards.name: Beam Pop
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Apply 1 Lock-On.

cards.name: Beam Pop+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Apply 2 Lock-On.

cards.name: Charge Beam
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: Charge Beam+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: Orb Boomerang
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Does an additional effect based on your next Orb.

cards.name: Orb Boomerang+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Does an additional effect based on your next Orb.

cards.name: Orb Shield
cards.description: Gain 3 Block for each unique Orb you have.

cards.name: Orb Shield+
cards.description: Gain 4 Block for each unique Orb you have.

cards.name: Reflex Channel
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to attack, Channel 1 Frost.
Otherwise, Channel 1 Lightning.

cards.name: Reflex Channel+
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to attack, Channel 1 Frost.
Otherwise, Channel 1 Lightning.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Rocket Punch
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Choose a card in your hand.
Add a copy of that card into your discard pile.

cards.name: Rocket Punch+
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Choose a card in your hand.
Add a copy of that card into your discard pile.

cards.name: Golden Lightning
cards.description:
Channel 1 [#EFC851]Golden [#EFC851]πLightning.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Golden Lightning+
cards.description:
Channel 1 [#EFC851]Golden [#EFC851]πLightning.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hex
cards.description:
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Apply 2 Lock-On.
Evoke your next Orb.

cards.name: Hex+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Vulnerable.
Apply 3 Lock-On.
Evoke your next Orb.

cards.name: Orb Hurl
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
Lose 1 Orb Slot.

cards.name: Orb Hurl+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
Lose 1 Orb Slot.

cards.name: Sharp Orbs
cards.description:
Gain 1 Orb Slot.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy for each Channeled Orb.

cards.name: Sharp Orbs+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Orb Slot.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy for each Channeled Orb.

cards.name: Shock Kick
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Gain 2 Focus.
At the end of this turn, lose 2 Focus.

cards.name: Shock Kick+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Gain 3 Focus.
At the end of this turn, lose 3 Focus.

cards.name: Tune Up
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block.
Increase the damage of a random Attack in your hand by 3 this combat.

cards.name: Tune Up+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
Increase the damage of a random Attack in your hand by 4 this combat.

cards.name: Blaze Kick
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Gain 1 stack of ANY random buff.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Blaze Kick+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Gain 2 stacks of ANY random buff.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Block Beam
cards.description:
Gain 15 Block.
Deal 15 damage.

cards.name: Block Beam+
cards.description:
Gain 19 Block.
Deal 19 damage.

cards.name: Chaotic Reactor
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Channel 1 random Orb.

cards.name: Chaotic Reactor+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Channel 1 random Orb.

cards.name: Dark Conflux
cards.description:
Channel 1 Dark.
Trigger the passive ability of all Dark orbs X times.

cards.name: Dark Conflux+
cards.description:
Channel 1 Dark.
Trigger the passive ability of all Dark orbs X+1 times.

cards.name: Growing Storm
cards.description:
Channel 1 Lightning.
Increase the number of Lightning this card Channels by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Growing Storm+
cards.description:
Channel 2 Lightning.
Increase the number of Lightning this card Channels by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Overload
cards.description:
Channel 1 random Orb for each Orb slot you have.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Overload+
cards.description:
Channel 1 random Orb for each Orb slot you have.
Gain 2 Orb slots.
Exhaust.

cards.name: System Update
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Gain 1 Focus.

cards.name: System Update+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Gain 1 Focus.

cards.name: Battle Rage
cards.description:
Can only be played at or below 50% HP.
Remove all your Debuffs.
Gain 6 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Battle Rage+
cards.description:
Can only be played at or below 50% HP.
Remove all your Debuffs.
Gain 12 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Defensive Stance
cards.description:
Gain 15 Block.
At the end of your turn, gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defensive Stance+
cards.description:
Gain 20 Block.
At the end of your turn, gain 7 Block.

cards.name: Execute
cards.description:
Can only be played at or below 50% HP.
Deal 10 damage twice.

cards.name: Execute+
cards.description:
Can only be played at or below 50% HP.
Deal 10 damage twice.

Apply 2 Weak.

Exhaust.

cards.name: Eye Beam+

cards.name: Face Slap+

Remove all Block from the enemy.
Deal 14 damage.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Gloat
cards.description: Gain 2 Strength.

cards.name: Gloat+
cards.description: Gain 4 Strength.

cards.name: Gorgon's Glare
cards.description:
Enemy loses 2 Strength.
Heal 2 HP.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gorgon's Glare+
cards.description:
Enemy loses 3 Strength.
Heal 3 HP.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Heavy Slash
cards.description: Deal 16 damage.

cards.name: Heavy Slash+
cards.description: Deal 18 damage.

cards.name: Magic Fruit
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Heal 1 HP.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Magic Fruit+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Heal 2 HP.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Snake's Skin
cards.description: Whenever you would receive unblocked Attack damage, reduce it by 2.

cards.name: Snake's Skin+
cards.description: Whenever you would receive unblocked Attack damage, reduce it by 3.

cards.name: Taunt
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Taunt+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Gain a little Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Coin Blast+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Gain a little Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fruity Dash
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Shuffle 2 [#EFC851]Magical [#EFC851]Fruit into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fruity Dash+
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Shuffle 3 [#EFC851]Magical [#EFC851]Fruit into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Plotting
cards.description: Next turn, draw 2 additional cards.

cards.name: Plotting+
cards.description: Next turn, draw 3 additional cards.

cards.name: Tweet Strike
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
If this kills a non-minion enemy, @DBotling tweets about it.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Tweet Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 19 damage.
If this kills a non-minion enemy, @DBotling tweets about it.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Antique Fury
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to 3 times the number of Relics you have.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Antique Fury+
cards.description: Deal damage equal to 3 times the number of Relics you have.

cards.name: Calendar Illness
cards.description:
Apply Poison equal to the day of the month.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Calendar Illness+
cards.description:
Apply Poison equal to the day of the month.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Chimeric Card
cards.description: Always changing, never stable... can be anything.

cards.name: Chimeric Card+
cards.description: Always changing, never stable... can be anything.

cards.name: Death Sprout
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
If this kills an enemy, add a [#EFC851]Magical [#EFC851]Fruit into your deck.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Death Sprout+
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
If this kills an enemy, add a [#EFC851]Magical [#EFC851]Fruit into your deck.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Full Service
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Deal 5 damage.
Gain 5 Block next turn.
Gain 5 Gold.
Apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Weak.
Apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Vulnerable.
Apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Poison.
Draw !vexMod:SecondMagic! cards.
Draw !vexMod:SecondMagic! more cards next turn.
Heal !vexMod:SecondMagic! HP.
Next turn, gain 1 Energy.
Upgrade a card in your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Full Service+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Deal 6 damage.
Gain 6 Block next turn.
Gain 6 Gold.
Apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Weak.
Apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Vulnerable.
Apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Poison.
Draw !vexMod:SecondMagic! cards.
Draw !vexMod:SecondMagic! more cards next turn.
Heal !vexMod:SecondMagic! HP.
Next turn, gain 1 Energy.
Upgrade a card in your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Golden Burst
cards.description:
Gain X0 Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Golden Burst+
cards.description:
Gain X0 Gold.
Gain [E] .
Exhaust.

cards.name: Name Guard
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block for each character in your name.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Name Guard+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block for each character in your name.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Resonance
cards.description:
Effect varies based on current master volume.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Resonance+
cards.description:
Effect varies based on current master volume.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Resourcefulness
cards.description: Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Resourcefulness+
cards.description:
Put a card from your draw pile into your hand.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Spire Strike
cards.description:
Costs 1 more for each Act cleared.
Deal damage equal to your floor number.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spire Strike+
cards.description:
Costs 1 more for each Act cleared.
Deal damage equal to your floor number.

cards.name: Very Week Card
cards.description:
Effect varies based on day of the week.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Very Week Card+
cards.description: Effect varies based on day of the week.

cards.name: Well-Timed Strike
cards.description:
Deal 0 damage.
Damage cycles from 0 to 50 quickly.

cards.name: Well-Timed Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 0 damage.
Damage cycles from 0 to 50 slowly.

cards.name: Wild Card
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the start of combat, choose a card.
This card becomes that card this combat.

cards.name: Wild Card+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the start of combat, choose an upgraded card.
This card becomes that card this combat.

cards.name: Fear
cards.description:
Ethereal.
At the end of your turn, gain 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Gorgon's Gaze
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, Exhaust all other cards in your hand.

cards.name: Greed
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, lose 6 Gold.

cards.name: Sloth
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, draw 1 less card next turn.

cards.name: Virus
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it into your hand.

cards.name: Weakness
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you draw this card, reduce the damage of a random Attack in your hand by 2 this combat.

relics.name: Backup Battery
relics.description: If you end your turn with any empty Orb slots, gain 3 Block.
relics.flavorText: Conserve energy! Shut off Orb slots when you're not using them.

relics.name: Bandanna of Resilience
relics.description: If you have 30 or less HP at the start of your turn, gain 5 Block.
relics.flavorText: In your strangest dreams, it appears and yells orders at you.

relics.name: Charge Upper
relics.description: Every time you gain 30 Block, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: "Oops, I fell asleep without plugging it in..."

relics.name: Cold Yogurt
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Frost.
relics.flavorText: You wonder if your enemies are lactose-intolerant.

relics.name: Consolation Prize
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP, gain Gold equal to HP lost.
relics.flavorText: Gold oozes from your wounds.

relics.name: Dusty Game Cartridge
relics.description: Whenever you draw a card (besides your hand each turn), gain 1 Block.
relics.flavorText: It's unclear which system the game was meant for.

relics.name: Gazer Beam
relics.description: When you play your first targeted Attack each combat, apply 2 Lock-On.
relics.flavorText: Last used to spell "KRONOS".

relics.name: Happy Drink
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 2. Whenever you enter a shop, increase your Max HP by 2.
relics.flavorText: The shop offers free refills.

relics.name: Last Will
relics.description:
Upon pickup, gain 111 Gold.
When you die or win, @DBotling tweets about your run.
relics.flavorText: Your possessions are bequeathed to The Merchant.

relics.name: Mediocre Mixtape
relics.description: At the start of each combat, perform a random bard:Melody.
relics.flavorText: Sounds familiar.

relics.name: Memory Locket
relics.description: At the end of your first turn, Retain your hand.
relics.flavorText: If you squeeze it hard enough you can remember the open beta.

relics.name: Pain Converter
relics.description: Whenever you receive 10 or more unblocked attack damage, draw 1 additional card and gain [E] next turn.
relics.flavorText: This machine seems to be magnetically attracted to your exposed injuries.

relics.name: Pet Star
relics.description: At the start of your turn, increment the Stellar Phase.
relics.flavorText: Feed with hydrogen and helium daily.

relics.name: Rainbow Shades
relics.description: The first time you draw an Ethereal card each combat, put a copy of it on top of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Lookin' to the sky in style.

relics.name: Relic Launcher
relics.description: At the start of each combat, deal damage to a random enemy equal to the number of Relics you have.
relics.flavorText: Mostly an excuse to use the FX.

relics.name: Right Greave
relics.description: At the start of turns 3 and 7, gain 7 Block.
relics.flavorText: Forever waiting to be reunited with Left Greave.

relics.name: Rock of Resting
relics.description: Whenever you Queue a [RestNote] [REMOVE_SPACE], gain 2 Block.
relics.flavorText: Just sit back and - for awhile.

relics.name: Singing Flower
relics.description: Every 3 turns, bard:Queue a [BuffNote] [REMOVE_SPACE].
relics.flavorText: It's, like, in tune with the planet's energy, dude!

relics.name: Spotlight
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 3 Starlit to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Light 'em up!

relics.name: Strike Shooter
relics.description: At the start of every third turn, play a πStrike at a random target.
relics.flavorText: All your sword-firing needs in one medium package!

relics.name: Anger Radio
relics.description: Every time you bard:Queue 3 of the same bard:Note in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Plays frustrating music.

relics.name: Berry Bomb
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 6. In 8 combats, explodes and deals 100 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Tastes explosive!

relics.name: Better-O-Tron
relics.description: The next 3 unupgraded cards you add into your deck are upgraded.
relics.flavorText: Mechanical device certain to improve your life somehow!

relics.name: Bottled Tune
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a bard:Note. At the start of each combat, bard:Queue that bard:Note.
relics.flavorText: You crack the lid and hear a faint sound.

relics.name: Dead Requiem
relics.description: Whenever you perform a bard:Melody, bard:Queue a random bard:Note.
relics.flavorText: Your toughest sheets.

relics.name: Dragon Fruit
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 5. At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies for each Attack played this turn.
relics.flavorText: As a connoisseur would say, piquant.

relics.name: Fallen Fruit
relics.description: At the start of each combat, shuffle 2 Magical Fruit into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: This one must have fallen off the Spire.

relics.name: Focus Sash
relics.description: When you would die while you have at least 10 HP, heal to 1 HP instead.
relics.flavorText: It's super effective!

relics.name: Galaxy Diorama
relics.description: The additional effects of your Solar and Lunar cards are always active.
relics.flavorText: Wholly innacurate.

relics.name: Gilded Shrine
relics.description: Whenever you add a card into your deck, gain 7 Gold.
relics.flavorText: Molten gold pours endlessly down the shrine.

relics.name: Invisible Cloak
relics.description: At the start of each combat, ALL enemies lose 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: You're far too modest to "wear" this.

relics.name: Key Chain
relics.description: When you play your first targeted Attack each combat, the enemy loses Strength equal to damage taken until the end of this turn.
relics.flavorText: Surprisingly sharp!

relics.name: Madness Lens
relics.description: At the start of each combat, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand to 0 this combat.
relics.flavorText: The Spire looks like a hellish, twisting wasteland through this glass.

relics.name: Protector Bot
relics.description: Whenever you play 2 or less cards during your turn, gain 5 Block at the end of the turn.
relics.flavorText: This little bot dives in to take attacks when you're wide open.

relics.name: Randomized Relic
relics.description: Has different qualities every time you find it.
relics.flavorText: Different every time!

relics.name: Shifting Skin
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 stack of ANY random buff.
relics.flavorText: Your body flows fluidly, changing to adapt to each situation...

relics.name: Skull Hunter
relics.description: Elites drop an additional Rare card reward.
relics.flavorText: You're bringing this conflict to a head.

relics.name: Thirteen-Hour Stone
relics.description: Every time you you draw 13 cards, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Number nine is the most important.

relics.name: Throwing Star
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Stars in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Unorthodox use for the stars, but it's OK.

relics.name: Wand of Magic Missile
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, deal 2-5 damage to a random enemy 3 times.
relics.flavorText: The end of this magic wand glows.

relics.name: Audience Doll
relics.description: Whenever you perform a bard:Melody, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Always there to listen and offer support!

relics.name: Box of Bandaids
relics.description: Whenever you add a card into your deck, heal 3 HP.
relics.flavorText: Vends only when shown cool techniques.

relics.name: Code Smelter
relics.description: Whenever you Channel an Orb, trigger its passive ability.
relics.flavorText: Combines subprocesses into one big clump. Simple!

relics.name: Cooling Fan
relics.description: Whenever you Channel an Orb, gain 2 Block.
relics.flavorText: This fan helps you save cycles when performing monster solution options.

relics.name: Fake Star
relics.description: The first Stellar card you play each combat will be active.
relics.flavorText: But if you squint it looks pretty real!

relics.name: Gravitational Rainbow
relics.description: At the start of every odd-numbered turn, put the bottom card of your draw pile into your hand.
relics.flavorText: "But rainbows aren't affected by gravity!" you say. Well, pah!

relics.name: Helpful Mold
relics.description: Whenever you gain Block, gain 1 Strength this turn.
relics.flavorText: This mold siphons off bits of your shield to feed itself.

relics.name: Midnight Ocarina
relics.description: Every time you play 7 Stars, perform a random bard:Melody.
relics.flavorText: The song of the stars is yours to echo...

relics.name: Orb of Greed
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Golden πLightning.
relics.flavorText: Mmm, money!

relics.name: Plasma Pancake
relics.description:
Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 6.
At the start of each combat, deal 11 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: It's literally on fire.

relics.name: Red Plotting Stone
relics.description:
Glows sometime.
Right click while glowing for a massive reward.
Right click while not glowing to lose.
relics.flavorText: Great for nefarious plans - as opposed to the Green Plotting Stone.

relics.name: Retaliation Kit
relics.description: The first time your Block is broken each combat, apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: All you need to disappear in a burst of smoke! Smoke no longer included.

relics.name: Starfruit
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 6. At the start of each combat, shuffle 3 Magical Fruit into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Tastes like stars.

relics.name: Starlight Tuner
relics.description: Whenever you perform a bard:Melody, increment the Stellar Phase and apply 1 Starlit to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Listen to the music of the stars...

relics.name: Teal Tab
relics.description: Add 2 copies of the 18th card you draw each combat into your hand. They cost 0 this combat.
relics.flavorText: Useful for categorization.

relics.name: Timesight Glass
relics.description: At the start of every even-numbered turn, put a random card from your discard pile into your hand.
relics.flavorText: You can see yourself a few minutes before.

relics.name: Warped Instrument
relics.description: Every 10th bard:Note you bard:Queue is a [WildNote] [REMOVE_SPACE].
relics.flavorText: This twisted bunch of tubes never quite sounds the same.

relics.name: Writhing Mask
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 4 Malleable.
relics.flavorText: It squirms on your face uncomfortably.

relics.name: Broadsword
relics.description: Draw 1 less card each turn. Start each combat with 4 Strength.
relics.flavorText: The smith fashioned you a slightly oversized weapon!

relics.name: Dootinator
relics.description: Whenever you bard:Queue a bard:Note, doot.
relics.flavorText: Previously owned by a skeleton.

relics.name: Double-Edged Sword
relics.description: Start each combat with 3 Strength. ALL enemies start combat with 1 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: The smith fashioned you an overly sharp blade!

relics.name: Draining Sword
relics.description: Start each combat with 2 less Strength. Whenever you play an Attack, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: The smith fashioned you a vampiric sword!

relics.name: Energy Relic
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain [E] in real life.
relics.flavorText: What do you mean you're still tired?

relics.name: Gorgon's Head
relics.description: ALL enemies start combat with 2 less Strength.
relics.flavorText: Pretty, but still formidable.

relics.name: Grifter Satchel
relics.description: All combats drop an additional Colorless card reward.
relics.flavorText: Used for many a not-so-good deed.

relics.name: Imaginary Sword
relics.description: Upon pickup, remove 2 Attacks from your deck.
relics.flavorText: Already, your memories of a smith feel faint...

relics.name: Infernal Sword
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, add a random Attack into your hand.
It costs 0 this turn.
relics.flavorText: This sword burns endlessly. You can't even hold it...

relics.name: Juggling Balls
relics.description: Everything bounces.
relics.flavorText: Made of rubber.

relics.name: Mini Solar System
relics.description: Relics now orbit you.
relics.flavorText: Something we all revolve around.

relics.name: Ne donne pas d'énergie
relics.description: At the start of your turn, Energy.
relics.flavorText: The images are looking awfully treacherous today.

relics.name: News Ticker
relics.description: Right click once per combat to see the latest Tweet by @DBotling.
relics.flavorText: Keep up with the latest and greatest of the Spire!

relics.name: Pepega.
relics.description: Really dude? That was just Pepega.
relics.flavorText: That's just Pepega.

relics.name: Place Exchanger
relics.description: Right click: Exchange places with an enemy. Activate once per combat.
relics.flavorText: Works exactly as written!

relics.name: Pop. Tire
relics.description:
Bounces.
High Score: 0
relics.flavorText: DEFEAT THE INFIDELS

relics.name: Rainbarrow
relics.description: Your targeting arrow is colorful.
relics.flavorText: Sparkly!

relics.name: Realism Engine
relics.description: Whenever you drink a potion, burp.
relics.flavorText: Now it all feels immersive.

relics.name: Robot's Gift
relics.description: Start each combat with 2 Orb slots.
relics.flavorText: The thankful boon of a strange automaton.

relics.name: Rusty Sword
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 less Strength. ALL enemies start combat with 2 less Strength.
relics.flavorText: The smith fashioned you a crunchy sword...

relics.name: Spire Shuffle
relics.description: Whenever you play an Attack, move to the right. Whenever you play a Skill, move to the left.
relics.flavorText: To the left! To the right! Woo-hoo!

relics.name: Ssserpent's Blood
relics.description: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 1 Gold for each floor you have climbed.
relics.flavorText: You can buy anything!

relics.name: Story Book
relics.description: Whenever you climb a floor, the Story grows.

relics.name: Toy Sword
relics.description: Start each combat with 2 less Strength. Whenever you play an Attack, the enemy loses 2 Strength this turn.
relics.flavorText: The smith fashioned you a little sword charm!

relics.name: Voice Box
relics.description: You can talk now.
relics.flavorText: You feel badly written.

relics.name: Wave Stone
relics.description: Your relics do the Wave.
relics.flavorText: So entrancing to look at.

relics.name: bottle
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card.
relics.flavorText: bottle

relics.name: Auto Tuner
relics.description: At the start of your turn, perform a random bard:Melody.
relics.flavorText: Sure, it sounds strange, but it's technically tuned!

relics.name: Big Berry
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 22.
relics.flavorText: You had no idea they could get this big.

relics.name: Clock Rock
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Upon pickup, set your run timer to -10 minutes. At the end of combat, rewind your run timer by 30 seconds. When your run timer hits 0, you lose.
relics.flavorText: Tick tock goes the clock rock.

relics.name: Cursed Compass
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Future maps contain only 1 path.
relics.flavorText: No matter which way you turn, it always points forwards...

relics.name: Cyborg Telescope
relics.description: Start each combat with 3 Orb slots. Whenever you play a Star, Channel 1 Lightning.
relics.flavorText: You realize now that every electric volt is a tiny star too.

relics.name: Demotivationator
relics.description: Gain [E] and bard:Inspiration -50 at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: "ALL the people in the Tri-State Area will be too lazy to work! MWAHAHAHA!"

relics.name: Devious Botling
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Torments you randomly in annoying ways. Insults you on Twitter when you die.
relics.flavorText: A tiny little mini-bot whose prime directive is to mess with people. Twitter at @DBotling.

relics.name: Endless Sickness
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of each combat, shuffle a Virus into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Always multiplying.

relics.name: Horrorstone
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Upon pickup, obtain 666 Gold and a random Blight.
relics.flavorText: Holding it fills you with terror. Your only goal is to lose it yet it always winds up back in your pocket.

relics.name: Improvement Manual
relics.description: Upon pickup, Upgrade 4 cards.
relics.flavorText: Ahh, so THAT's how you make a card Innate!

relics.name: Indestructible Card Box
relics.description:
Replaces Deck Case.
Curse and Status cards cannot enter your deck or draw pile.
relics.flavorText: The only way to truly keep your cards tricks safe.

relics.name: Mall Pass
relics.description: ALL ? rooms contain The Merchant. Whenever you encounter The Merchant, gain 50 Gold.
relics.flavorText: Now you can get the great discounts!

relics.name: Mind Devourer
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of combat, remove a random card from your deck.
relics.flavorText: Mm, shiny! Wait, what was your name again?

relics.name: New, Clear Reactor
relics.description: Energy is conserved between turns and combats. You no longer gain Energy each turn. Set your energy to 100 upon pickup and at the start of each Act.
relics.flavorText: Totally safe! Good for the environment! Fosters mutations!

relics.name: Pipes of Chaos
relics.description:
Replaces Bag Pipes.
Draw 2 less cards each turn. Whenever you play a card, bard:Queue a [WildNote] [REMOVE_SPACE].
relics.flavorText: Crafted by an evil god, you shudder to play it.

relics.name: Sight of Future Skies
relics.description:
Replaces Sky's Mirror.
Whenever you play a card, put it on the bottom of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: You see it all laid out. One day the sky shall burn away.

relics.name: Star Eater
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of your turn, decrease the Stellar Phase by 2.
relics.flavorText: One by one, the stars in the sky wink out.

relics.name: Star Player Flyer
relics.description: Your Diamonds increment the Stellar Phase as an additional Showdown effect. Your Spades apply 1 Starlit to a random enemy as an additional Showdown effect. Your Clubs do both.
relics.flavorText: A grim memory of your past in the tournaments.

relics.name: Stone Buddy
relics.description: Every other turn, assists with a helpful effect.
relics.flavorText: Your new teammate. It rocks!

relics.name: Superbombomb
relics.description:
At the end of your turn, lose 1 HP from radiation poisoning.
Right click: Destroy this relic and OBLITERATE all enemies.
relics.flavorText: A superweapon beyond any technology. Who made this...?

relics.name: Tangling Vine
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of your turn, lose 3 Block.
relics.flavorText: Don't take this the wrong way.

relics.name: Adventure Map
relics.description: ALL ? rooms contain events.
relics.flavorText: The real treasure was the friends we made along the way.

relics.name: Berry Sword
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 8. The first card you play each combat is removed from your deck.
relics.flavorText: Tiny bites of this sword invigorate you.

relics.name: Broken Bowl
relics.description: Whenever you add an unupgraded card to your deck, Upgrade it and lose 2 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: Sand drains from it endlessly.

relics.name: Cooldron
relics.description: All Potions you find are Entropic Brews.
relics.flavorText: This cauldron is a lot cooler than any regular old cauldron.

relics.name: Future Thief Glove
relics.description: Right click: Steal a card from yourself in the future.
relics.flavorText: Self-destructive thievery.

relics.name: Ghostly Gear
relics.description: Whenever you play a πStrike or Defend, Exhaust it.
relics.flavorText: The sword and shield are more difficult to see each time you look.

relics.name: Gilded Clover
relics.description: ALL future cards you find are Rare.
relics.flavorText: Super-duper rare!

relics.name: Golden Armor
relics.description:
Your HP and Max HP are ALWAYS set equal to your Gold.
Instead of losing HP, lose twice that much Gold.
relics.flavorText: Expensive... but worth it?

relics.name: Lich's Phylactery
relics.description: Prevent ALL HP loss. For every 10 damage prevented, remove a random card from your deck. When your deck has no cards, you lose.
relics.flavorText: It feels cold in your hands, no matter what you do ...

relics.name: Paid Education
relics.description: Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 cards.
relics.flavorText: That was just the down payment.

relics.name: Pill Tracker
relics.description: At the start of turn 5, remove all of your debuffs.
relics.flavorText: Always remember to take your medication on time!

relics.name: Regenerative Virus
relics.description:
Upon pickup, set your Max HP to 30.
At the end of combat, heal to full HP.
relics.flavorText: The side effects are ... best left unsaid.

relics.name: Rock Basket
relics.description: You can only find relics from vexMod. At the start of your turn, deal damage to a random enemy equal to the number of vexMod relics you have.
relics.flavorText: Because y'all already know I'm the best.

relics.name: Salvaging Tools
relics.description: Whenever you discard a card, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 this turn.
relics.flavorText: "Curious! These primitive things are utterly useless." -Ranwid

relics.name: Scavenger Helm
relics.description: At the end of your turn, Retain up to 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Used by the tribes far from the Spire.

relics.name: Snail's Watch
relics.description: Whenever you play 12 cards in a single combat, end your turn and gain 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Someone is going to want this back.

relics.name: Sword of Lies
relics.description: Start each combat with 2 Strength. At the start of each combat, add a random Curse into your hand.
relics.flavorText: "I am the Sword of Truth."

relics.name: Trinoculars
relics.description: The maximum Stellar Phase is now 63.
relics.flavorText: Lets you see three times as many stars!

relics.name: Xtacy
relics.description: After you play a cost X card, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: Sure to liven up your nights!

potions.name: Blaze Potion
potions.description: Gain 2 stacks of ANY random buff.

potions.name: Tweet Potion
potions.description: Gain 1 stack of ANY random buff. @DBotling tweets about your run.
